segment.source: High Availability for MBAM 1.0
segment.target: High Availability for MBAM 1.0

segment.source: High Availability for MBAM 1.0
segment.target: High Availability for MBAM 1.0

segment.source: High Availability for MBAM 1.0
segment.target: High Availability for MBAM 1.0

segment.source: This topic describes how to configure a highly available installation of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM).
segment.target: This topic describes how to configure a highly available installation of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM).

segment.source: High Availability Scenarios for MBAM
segment.target: High Availability Scenarios for MBAM

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) is designed to be fault-tolerant.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) is designed to be fault-tolerant.

segment.source: If a server becomes unavailable, the users should not be negatively affected.
segment.target: If a server becomes unavailable, the users should not be negatively affected.

segment.source: For example, if the MBAM agent cannot connect to the MBAM web server, users should not be prompted for action.
segment.target: For example, if the MBAM agent cannot connect to the MBAM web server, users should not be prompted for action.

segment.source: When you plan your MBAM installation, consider the following concerns that can affect the availability of the MBAM service:
segment.target: When you plan your MBAM installation, consider the following concerns that can affect the availability of the MBAM service:

segment.source: Drive encryption and recovery password – If a recovery password cannot be escrowed, the encryption will not start on the client computer.
segment.target: Drive encryption and recovery password – If a recovery password cannot be escrowed, the encryption will not start on the client computer.

segment.source: Compliance status data upload – If the server that hosts the compliance status report service is not available, the compliance data will not remain current.
segment.target: Compliance status data upload – If the server that hosts the compliance status report service is not available, the compliance data will not remain current.

segment.source: Help Desk recovery key access - If the Help Desk cannot access MBAM database information, they will be unable to provide recovery keys to users.
segment.target: Help Desk recovery key access - If the Help Desk cannot access MBAM database information, they will be unable to provide recovery keys to users.

segment.source: Availability of reports – Reports will not be available if the server that hosts the Compliance and Audit Reports is not available.
segment.target: Availability of reports – Reports will not be available if the server that hosts the Compliance and Audit Reports is not available.

segment.source: The main concern for MBAM high availability is BitLocker key recovery availability.
segment.target: The main concern for MBAM high availability is BitLocker key recovery availability.

segment.source: If the help desk cannot provide recovery keys, users who are locked out cannot unlock their computers.
segment.target: If the help desk cannot provide recovery keys, users who are locked out cannot unlock their computers.

segment.source: To avoid this problem, consider implementing redundant web servers and databases to ensure high availability.
segment.target: To avoid this problem, consider implementing redundant web servers and databases to ensure high availability.

segment.source: For more information about MBAM scalability and high availability, see the MBAM Scalability White Paper (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=229025).
segment.target: For more information about MBAM scalability and high availability, see the MBAM Scalability White Paper (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=229025).

segment.source: For general guidance on high availability for Microsoft SQL Server, see High Availability (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=221504).
segment.target: For general guidance on high availability for Microsoft SQL Server, see High Availability (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=221504).

segment.source: For general guidance on availability and scalability for web servers, see Availability and Scalability (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=221503).
segment.target: For general guidance on availability and scalability for web servers, see Availability and Scalability (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=221503).
